languages.text: {n}Маражай издает разочарованный вздох.{/n} "Неужели? Сейчас, когда я решил быть с тобой откровенен, ты решил{mf||а} оскорбиться на истину? Тебе не кажется, что для сожалений уже несколько... поздновато?" {n}Друкари издевательски смеется.{/n} "Впрочем, дело твое. Я получил то, что хотел. Что касается тебя... то это твои заботы".

{n}Marazhai lets out a disappointed sigh.{/n} "Really? Now that I have decided to be candid with you, you decide to be offended by the truth? Is it not a bit... late for regrets?" {n}He laughs mockingly.{/n} "But suit yourself. I got what I wanted. As for your feelings... they are your concern."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай издает разочарованный вздох.{/n} "Неужели? Сейчас, когда я решил быть с тобой откровенен, ты решил{mf||а} оскорбиться на истину? Тебе не кажется, что для сожалений уже несколько... поздновато?" {n}Друкари издевательски смеется.{/n} "Впрочем, дело твое. Я получил то, что хотел. Что касается тебя... то это твои заботы".

{n}Marazhai lets out a disappointed sigh.{/n} "Really? Now that I have decided to be candid with you, you decide to be offended by the truth? Is it not a bit... late for regrets?" {n}He laughs mockingly.{/n} "But suit yourself. I got what I wanted. As for your feelings... they are your concern."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋失望地叹了一口气。{/n}“是吗？我才刚刚对你彻底坦白，你就觉得这样的真相伤害了你？现在后悔是否有些……太晚了？”{n}他嘲弄地大笑起来。{/n}“不过，随便你。我已经得到了我想要的东西，至于你的感受……那是你自己的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a disappointed sigh.{/n} "Really? Now that I have decided to be candid with you, you decide to be offended by the truth? Is it not a bit... late for regrets?" {n}He laughs mockingly.{/n} "But suit yourself. I got what I wanted. As for your feelings... they are your concern."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋失望地叹了一口气。{/n}“是吗？我才刚刚对你彻底坦白，你就觉得这样的真相伤害了你？现在后悔是否有些……太晚了？”{n}他嘲弄地大笑起来。{/n}“不过，随便你。我已经得到了我想要的东西，至于你的感受……那是你自己的事情。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai suspira decepcionado.{/n} «¿De verdad? ¿Ahora que yo he decidido ser sincero contigo, tú decides ofenderte por oír la verdad? ¿No te parece un poco... tarde para arrepentirte?». {n}Profiere una risa burlona.{/n} «Bueno, tú verás. Yo ya he conseguido lo que quería. En cuanto a tus sentimientos... son tu problema, no el mío».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a disappointed sigh.{/n} "Really? Now that I have decided to be candid with you, you decide to be offended by the truth? Is it not a bit... late for regrets?" {n}He laughs mockingly.{/n} "But suit yourself. I got what I wanted. As for your feelings... they are your concern."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai suspira decepcionado.{/n} «¿De verdad? ¿Ahora que yo he decidido ser sincero contigo, tú decides ofenderte por oír la verdad? ¿No te parece un poco... tarde para arrepentirte?». {n}Profiere una risa burlona.{/n} «Bueno, tú verás. Yo ya he conseguido lo que quería. En cuanto a tus sentimientos... son tu problema, no el mío».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un soupir de déception.{/n} « Vraiment ? Maintenant que je me résous enfin à être franc avec vous, vous décidez de vous sentir {mf|offensé|offensée} par la vérité ? N'est-il pas un peu tard pour réagir ainsi ? » {n}Il éclate d'un rire moqueur.{/n} « Enfin, ça m'est égal. J'ai obtenu ce que je voulais. Quant à vos sentiments... ils ne me concernent en rien. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a disappointed sigh.{/n} "Really? Now that I have decided to be candid with you, you decide to be offended by the truth? Is it not a bit... late for regrets?" {n}He laughs mockingly.{/n} "But suit yourself. I got what I wanted. As for your feelings... they are your concern."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un soupir de déception.{/n} « Vraiment ? Maintenant que je me résous enfin à être franc avec vous, vous décidez de vous sentir {mf|offensé|offensée} par la vérité ? N'est-il pas un peu tard pour réagir ainsi ? » {n}Il éclate d'un rire moqueur.{/n} « Enfin, ça m'est égal. J'ai obtenu ce que je voulais. Quant à vos sentiments... ils ne me concernent en rien. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai seufzt enttäuscht.{/n} "Wirklich? Ich habe beschlossen, ich Euch gegenüber zu öffnen, und Ihr fühlt Euch von meiner Wahrheit gekränkt? Ist es nicht ein wenig ... spät für Bedauern?" {n}Er lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Aber wie Ihr meint. Ich habe bekommen, was ich wollte. Was Eure Gefühle angeht ... das ist Euer Problem."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a disappointed sigh.{/n} "Really? Now that I have decided to be candid with you, you decide to be offended by the truth? Is it not a bit... late for regrets?" {n}He laughs mockingly.{/n} "But suit yourself. I got what I wanted. As for your feelings... they are your concern."

Ist es nicht ein wenig ... spät für Bedauern?" {n}Er lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Aber wie Ihr meint. Ich habe bekommen, was ich wollte. Was Eure Gefühle angeht ... das ist Euer Problem."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはがっかりしたようにため息をついた。{/n}「本気か？俺様がお前に率直に話すと決めた今になって、お前はその真実に機嫌を損ねると？後悔するには少しばかり…遅くはないか？」{n}彼は嘲るように笑う。{/n}「だが、好きにしろ。俺様は欲しいものは手に入れた。お前の気持ちは…お前が自分でどうにかすることだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a disappointed sigh.{/n} "Really? Now that I have decided to be candid with you, you decide to be offended by the truth? Is it not a bit... late for regrets?" {n}He laughs mockingly.{/n} "But suit yourself. I got what I wanted. As for your feelings... they are your concern."

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a disappointed sigh.{/n} "Really? Now that I have decided to be candid with you, you decide to be offended by the truth? Is it not a bit... late for regrets?" {n}He laughs mockingly.{/n} "But suit yourself. I got what I wanted. As for your feelings... they are your concern."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, hayal kırıklığıyla iç çekiyor.{/n} "Gerçekten mi? Tam da sana karşı dürüst olmaya karar vermişken gidip duyduğun hakikatten incinmeye mi karar verdin? Pişmanlıklar için biraz... Geç değil mi?" {n}Alay edercesine kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Neyse, keyfine bak. Ben istediğimi aldım. Duyguların konusundaysa... Onlar senin derdin."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a disappointed sigh.{/n} "Really? Now that I have decided to be candid with you, you decide to be offended by the truth? Is it not a bit... late for regrets?" {n}He laughs mockingly.{/n} "But suit yourself. I got what I wanted. As for your feelings... they are your concern."

Pişmanlıklar için biraz... Geç değil mi?" {n}Alay edercesine kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Neyse, keyfine bak. Ben istediğimi aldım. Duyguların konusundaysa... Onlar senin derdin."
